Máº¹o sá»‘ 4: Táº¡m biá»‡t ná»—i lo ngáº¯t káº¿t ná»‘i Colabâ€‹

ÄÃ¢y cÃ³ láº½ váº¥n Ä‘á» nhá»©c nhá»‘i mÃ  Zootopi khÃ¡ cháº¯c ráº±ng nhiá»u báº¡n Ä‘Ã£ tá»«ng gáº·p pháº£i khi lÃ m viá»‡c vá»›i Colab. Táº¥t nhiÃªn, sau Ä‘Ã³ Zootopi phÃ¡t hiá»‡n ra ráº±ng Colab sáº½ ngáº¯t káº¿t ná»‘i file notebook náº¿u ta Ä‘á»ƒ nÃ³ khÃ´ng hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng trong hÆ¡n 30 phÃºt. NhÆ°ng ká»ƒ tá»« hÃ´m nay, báº¡n sáº½ khÃ´ng bao giá» pháº£i Ä‘á»‘i máº·t vá»›i váº¥n Ä‘á» nÃ y bá»Ÿi Zootopi Ä‘Ã£ tÃ¬m ra Ä‘Æ°á»£c 1 giáº£i phÃ¡p cho váº¥n Ä‘á» nÃ y.

item.description: 1. Táº¡o mÃ´ hÃ¬nh vá»›i bá»™ dá»¯ liá»‡u vá» giÃ¡ nhÃ trung bÃ¬nh California Housing Dataset
item.content:encoded:
1. Táº¡o mÃ´ hÃ¬nh vá»›i bá»™ dá»¯ liá»‡u vá» giÃ¡ nhÃ  trung bÃ¬nh California Housing Datasetâ€‹

California Housing Dataset gá»“m 20640 báº£n ghi vá»›i 8 Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng dá»± Ä‘oÃ¡n vÃ  nhÃ£n target, trong Ä‘Ã³ cÃ¡c Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng mang Ã½ nghÄ©a nhÆ° sau:

Äáº·c trÆ°ngÃ nghÄ©a
MedIncThu nháº­p trung bÃ¬nh
HouseAgeTuá»•i nhÃ  trung bÃ¬nh
AveRoomsSá»‘ phÃ²ng trung bÃ¬nh
AveBedrmsSá»‘ phÃ²ng ngá»§ trung bÃ¬nh
PopulationSá»‘ thÃ nh viÃªn há»™ gia Ä‘Ã¬nh trung bÃ¬nh
AveOccupSá»‘ thÃ nh viÃªn há»™ gia Ä‘Ã¬nh trung bÃ¬nh
LatitudeVÄ© Ä‘á»™
LongitudeKinh Ä‘á»™

ÄÃ¢y lÃ  táº­p dá»¯ liá»‡u cÃ³ sáºµn trong thÆ° viá»‡n Sklearn nÃªn chÃºng ta hoÃ n toÃ n cÃ³ tháº¿ gá»i ra thÃ´ng qua hÃ m fetch_california_housing(). TÆ°Æ¡ng tá»± nhÆ° cÃ¡c bÃ i toÃ¡n há»c mÃ¡y thÃ´ng thÆ°á»ng, ta chia dá»¯ liá»‡u thÃ nh táº­p huáº¥n luyá»‡n vÃ  táº­p kiá»ƒm thá»­ vÃ  sá»­ dá»¥ng mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Random Forest Ä‘á»ƒ huáº¥n luyá»‡n vÃ  dá»± Ä‘oÃ¡n trÃªn cáº£ 2 táº­p dá»¯ liá»‡u Ä‘Ã£ chia.

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.datasets import fetch_california_housing
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor
from sklearn.inspection import permutation_importance
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
# Khá»Ÿi táº¡o dá»¯ liá»‡u
housing = fetch_california_housing()
X = pd.DataFrame(housing.data, columns=housing.feature_names)
Y = pd.Series(housing.target)
X.info()
<class 'pandas.core.frame.DataFrame'>
RangeIndex: 20640 entries, 0 to 20639
Data columns (total 8 columns):
 #   Column      Non-Null Count  Dtype  
---  ------      --------------  -----  
 0   MedInc      20640 non-null  float64
 1   HouseAge    20640 non-null  float64
 2   AveRooms    20640 non-null  float64
 3   AveBedrms   20640 non-null  float64
 4   Population  20640 non-null  float64
 5   AveOccup    20640 non-null  float64
 6   Latitude    20640 non-null  float64
 7   Longitude   20640 non-null  float64
dtypes: float64(8)
memory usage: 1.3 MB
# Chia dá»¯ liá»‡u thÃ nh táº­p huáº¥n luyá»‡n vÃ  táº­p kiá»ƒm thá»­
X_train, X_test, Y_train, Y_test = train_test_split(X, Y, test_size = 0.2, random_state=42)
# Khá»Ÿi táº¡o mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Random Forest
regr = RandomForestRegressor(max_depth = 5, random_state = 42, n_estimators = 100)
# Fit dá»¯ liá»‡u huáº¥n luyá»‡n vÃ o mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Ä‘Ã£ khá»Ÿi táº¡o
regr.fit(X_train, Y_train)

# Dá»± Ä‘oÃ¡n nhÃ£n trÃªn táº­p huáº¥n luyá»‡n vÃ  táº­p kiá»ƒm thá»­
Y_predict_train = regr.predict(X_train)
Y_predict = regr.predict(X_test)

2. Lá»±a chá»n nhá»¯ng Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng quan trá»ng (feature importance)â€‹

Má»™t trong nhá»¯ng lÃ­ do chÃºng mÃ¬nh chá»n mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Random Forest Ä‘Ã³ lÃ  bá»Ÿi chÃºng ta cÃ³ thá»ƒ dá»… dÃ ng trá»±c quan nhá»¯ng Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng quan trá»ng, Ä‘Æ°á»£c sá»­ dá»¥ng nhiá»u trong mÃ´ hÃ¬nh. Äá»ƒ Ä‘Ã¡nh giÃ¡ Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng quan trá»ng cÅ©ng nhÆ° trá»±c quan hoÃ¡ thá»© tá»± quan trá»ng cá»§a cÃ¡c Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng nÃ y, chÃºng ta cÃ³ thá»ƒ lÃ m nhÆ° sau:

# HÃ m trá»±c quan hoÃ¡ trung bÃ¬nh má»©c quan trá»ng cá»§a cÃ¡c Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng
def feature_plot_importance(importance_df):
  plt.rcParams.update({'font.size': 16})
  plt.rcParams["figure.figsize"] = (12,5)
  fig, ax = plt.subplots()
  x = np.arange(len(importance_df))
  width = 0.77
  rects1 = ax.bar(x, 
                  height = importance_df['means'], 
                  width = width, 
                  yerr = importance_df['stds'], 
                  align='center', 
                  ecolor='black', 
                  capsize=5)
  ax.set_ylabel('Feature Importance')
  ax.set_xticks(x)
  ax.set_xticklabels(importance_df['feature_labels'])
  ax.set_title('Feature Importance Initial Model')
  plt.tight_layout()
# ÄÃ¡nh giÃ¡ Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng quan trá»ng trÃªn táº­p huáº¥n luyá»‡n
perm_feature_importance = permutation_importance(regr, X_train, Y_train)

# Táº¡o DataFrame chá»©a nhÃ£n vÃ  trung bÃ¬nh, Ä‘á»™ lá»‡ch chuáº©n má»©c quan trá»ng
importance_df = pd.DataFrame({'feature_labels': X_train.columns,
                              'means' : perm_feature_importance['importances_mean'],
                              'stds' : perm_feature_importance['importances_std']})

# Trá»±c quan hoÃ¡ trung bÃ¬nh má»©c quan trá»ng cá»§a cÃ¡c Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng
feature_plot_importance(importance_df)

Dá»±a vÃ o feature importance tá»« mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Random Forest, cÃ³ thá»ƒ tháº¥y MedInc, AveOccup, HouseAge lÃ  3 Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng quan trá»ng. Ta hoÃ n toÃ n cÃ³ thá»ƒ xÃ¢y dá»±ng 1 mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Random Forest má»›i vá»›i chá»‰ nhá»¯ng Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng quan trá»ng.

# Chá»n lá»c nhá»¯ng Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng cÃ³ Ä‘iá»ƒm feature importance cao
X_train_reduced = X_train.loc[:,['MedInc','HouseAge','AveOccup']]

# Khá»Ÿi táº¡o mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Random Forest
regr = RandomForestRegressor(max_depth = 5, random_state = 42, n_estimators = 100)
regr.fit(X_train_reduced, Y_train)

perm_feature_importance = permutation_importance(regr, X_train_reduced, Y_train)

# Táº¡o DataFrame chá»©a nhÃ£n vÃ  trung bÃ¬nh, Ä‘á»™ lá»‡ch chuáº©n má»©c quan trá»ng
importance_df_reduced = pd.DataFrame({'feature_labels': X_train_reduced.columns,
                                      'means' : perm_feature_importance['importances_mean'],
                                      'stds' : perm_feature_importance['importances_std']})

# Trá»±c quan hoÃ¡ trung bÃ¬nh má»©c quan trá»ng cá»§a cÃ¡c Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng
feature_plot_importance(importance_df_reduced)

Dá»±a vÃ o feature importance tá»« mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Random Forest, cÃ³ thá»ƒ tháº¥y MedInc, AveOccup, HouseAge lÃ  3 Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng quan trá»ng. NhÆ°ng chá»‰ dá»±a vÃ o Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng thÃ¬ khÃ³ cÃ³ thá»ƒ tháº¥y Ä‘Æ°á»£c má»‘i liÃªn há»‡ giá»¯a Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng Ä‘Ã³ vá»›i viá»‡c mÃ´ hÃ¬nh Ä‘Æ°a ra káº¿t quáº£ dá»± Ä‘oÃ¡n. Äá»ƒ giáº£i quyáº¿t váº¥n Ä‘á» nÃ y, chÃºng ta sáº½ cÃ¹ng nhau Ä‘áº¿n vá»›i Biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ Phá»¥ thuá»™c Tá»«ng pháº§n (Partial Dependence Plot).

3. Minh há»a cÃ¡ch táº¡o ra Biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ Phá»¥ thuá»™c Tá»«ng pháº§n

3.1. Sá»­ dá»¥ng Scikit-Learnâ€‹

Biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ PDP:

  • 1D: biá»ƒu diá»…n sá»± phá»¥ thuá»™c giá»¯a má»¥c tiÃªu dá»± Ä‘oÃ¡n vÃ  nhá»¯ng Ä‘áº·c trÆ°Æ¡ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c quan tÃ¢m (features of interest - nhá»¯ng Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c lá»±a chá»n bá»Ÿi feature importance)
  • 2D: biá»ƒu diá»…n sá»± phá»¥ thuá»™c giá»¯a 2 Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng Ä‘Æ°á»£c quan tÃ¢m vÃ  tÃ¡c Ä‘á»™ng cá»§a nÃ³ lÃªn má»¥c tiÃªu dá»± Ä‘oÃ¡n

ChÃºng ta cÃ³ thá»ƒ biá»ƒu diá»…n biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ nÃ y thÃ´ng qua PartialDependenceDisplay.from_estimator() tá»« thÆ° viá»‡n sklearn.inspection.

from sklearn.inspection import PartialDependenceDisplay

Vá»›i biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ DPD 1D, ta cÃ³:

PartialDependenceDisplay.from_estimator(regr, 
                                        X_train_reduced, 
                                        features = ['MedInc'], 
                                        percentiles = [0,1]);

PartialDependenceDisplay.from_estimator(regr, 
                                        X_train_reduced, 
                                        features = ['HouseAge'], 
                                        percentiles = [0,1]);

PartialDependenceDisplay.from_estimator(regr, 
                                        X_train_reduced, 
                                        features = ['AveOccup'], 
                                        percentiles = [0,1]);

Vá»›i biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ DPD 2D, ta cÃ³:

MedInc_AvcOccup_disp = PartialDependenceDisplay.from_estimator(regr, 
                                                               X_train_reduced, 
                                                               features = [(0,2)], 
                                                               percentiles = [0,1],
                                                               grid_resolution = 20)

MedInc_HouseAge_disp = PartialDependenceDisplay.from_estimator(regr, 
                                                               X_train_reduced, 
                                                               features = [(0,1)], 
                                                               percentiles = [0,1], 
                                                               grid_resolution = 20)

AveOccup_HouseAge_disp = PartialDependenceDisplay.from_estimator(regr, 
                                                                 X_train_reduced, 
                                                                 features = [(2,1)], 
                                                                 percentiles = [0,1], 
                                                                 grid_resolution = 10)

Ta hoÃ n toÃ n cÃ³ thá»ƒ thÃªm cÃ¡c Ä‘iá»ƒm dá»¯ liá»‡u vÃ o biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ PDP báº±ng cÃ¡ch sau:

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 5))
AveOccup_HouseAge_disp.plot(ax = ax)
plt.scatter(X_train_reduced['AveOccup'], 
            X_train_reduced['HouseAge'],
            alpha = 0.2, 
            color = 'black');

3.2. Sá»­ dá»¥ng thÆ° viá»‡n PDPboxâ€‹

  • CÃ i Ä‘áº·t thÆ° viá»‡n: !pip install pdpbox
  • Link: https://github.com/SauceCat/PDPbox
from pdpbox import pdp

CÃ³ thá»ƒ tháº¥y tÆ°Æ¡ng tá»± nhÆ° biá»ƒu Ä‘á»“ PDP cá»§a Scikit-Learn, vá»›i Ä‘áº·c trÆ°ng MedInc, giÃ¡ nhÃ  trung bÃ¬nh cÅ©ng tÄƒng khi thu nháº­p trung bÃ¬nh tÄƒng (vá»›i MedInc lá»›n hÆ¡n 2). Vá»›i thu nháº­p trung bÃ¬nh lá»›n hÆ¡n khoáº£ng 6, giÃ¡ nhÃ  tÄƒng khÃ¡ nhiá»u vÃ  á»•n Ä‘á»‹nh. 

pdp_MedInc = pdp.pdp_isolate(model=regr, 
                             dataset=X_train_reduced, 
                             model_features=X_train_reduced.columns, 
                             feature='MedInc')
fig, axes = pdp.pdp_plot(pdp_MedInc, 'MedInc', plot_lines=True, frac_to_plot=100, plot_pts_dist=True);

pdp_MedInc = pdp.pdp_isolate(model=regr, 
                             dataset=X_train_reduced, 
                             model_features=X_train_reduced.columns, 
                             feature='HouseAge')
fig, axes = pdp.pdp_plot(pdp_MedInc, 'HouseAge', plot_lines=True, frac_to_plot=100, plot_pts_dist=True);

pdp_MedInc = pdp.pdp_isolate(model=regr, 
                             dataset=X_train_reduced, 
                             model_features=X_train_reduced.columns,
